title: Fairy Realm Crossing Adventure #10
goal: Solve the puzzles, achieve the main objective, and escape.

rooms.name: Enchanted Glade
rooms.description: A mystical clearing bathed in soft, ethereal light filtering through ancient trees. Glowing mushrooms form a circle around a crystal-clear pond. Fireflies dance in the air, leaving trails of sparkling dust. The air hums with fairy magic, and you can hear the tinkling of distant bells. A massive oak tree with a door carved into its trunk stands at the center.

items.name: crystal-clear pond
items.description: A perfectly still pond that reflects the sky like a mirror. Something glimmers beneath the surface.

items.name: silver acorn
items.description: A magical acorn made of pure silver, warm to the touch

items.name: fairy ring of mushrooms
items.description: A perfect circle of glowing toadstools. In the center sits a small wooden box.

items.name: scroll of fairy riddles
items.description: A tiny scroll written in shimmering ink
items.text: Riddle of the Fae: Three gifts unlock the ancient oak - the number of petals on a moonflower, the number of wings on a pixie, and the number of seasons in the fairy realm. Seek these answers in the glade.

items.name: ancient oak tree
items.description: A massive oak with a beautifully carved door. The tree has three hollow compartments at different heights.

items.name: moonflower botanical guide
items.description: A small book about magical flowers
items.text: The Moonflower: This rare bloom opens only under moonlight and has exactly 5 petals. Pixies, the smallest of fae folk, have 4 wings. The fairy realm experiences only 2 seasons: eternal spring and eternal autumn.

items.name: golden key
items.description: A delicate key made of gold, engraved with leaf patterns

items.name: bed of glowing flowers
items.description: A patch of luminescent flowers that seem to whisper secrets

items.name: pixie's message
items.description: A note written in tiny, elegant script
items.text: Dear traveler, I am Dewdrop the pixie. To cross into the Fairy Court, you must know: Who tends the gardens? Where do the fae dance? What is the queen's true name?

items.name: carved oak door
items.description: A door carved into the ancient oak, decorated with intricate fairy symbols. It has a golden keyhole.

rooms.name: Twilight Garden
rooms.description: A breathtaking garden suspended between day and night. Half the garden blooms in eternal sunset, while the other half glows under starlight. Crystalline fountains sing melodious tunes, and paths of luminescent stones wind between beds of impossible flowers. Statues of fairy nobles line the walkways, and an ornate gazebo stands at the garden's heart.

items.name: statue of the Royal Gardener
items.description: A marble statue of a fairy holding pruning shears and a watering can
items.text: Plaque reads: 'Thornblossom, Royal Gardener - Keeper of the Twilight Garden and tender of all growing things in the realm.'

items.name: statue of a dancing fairy
items.description: A graceful statue of a fairy in mid-dance
items.text: Plaque reads: 'In memory of the Grand Ball - Where fae folk gather to dance beneath the stars in the Moonlit Pavilion.'

items.name: statue of the Fairy Queen
items.description: A regal statue wearing a crown of flowers
items.text: Plaque reads: 'Queen Titania Starweaver - Eternal ruler of the Fairy Realm, beloved by all who dwell within.'

items.name: singing crystal fountain
items.description: A fountain made of pure crystal that produces musical notes as water flows through it

items.name: sapphire petal
items.description: A flower petal made of solid sapphire, one of the sacred treasures

items.name: ornate gazebo
items.description: A beautiful gazebo with a locked chest inside and decorative panels

items.name: history of the realm
items.description: An illuminated manuscript detailing fairy history
items.text: The Fairy Realm was created by Queen Titania Starweaver in ages past. The sacred treasures - the Sapphire Petal and Emerald Leaf - must be united to open the portal home.

items.name: emerald leaf
items.description: A leaf carved from pure emerald, the second sacred treasure

items.name: archway of living vines
items.description: An archway woven from living vines covered in blooming flowers. Three questions are carved into a wooden sign hanging from the arch.

password_questions.question: Who tends the gardens?
password_questions.hint: Check the statue of the Royal Gardener

password_questions.question: Where do the fae dance?
password_questions.hint: Read the inscription on the dancing fairy statue

password_questions.question: What is the queen's true name?
password_questions.hint: The queen's statue reveals her full name

rooms.name: Chamber of the Crossing
rooms.description: A circular chamber with walls of living crystal that pulse with rainbow light. In the center stands a stone altar with two indentations shaped like a petal and a leaf. Above the altar, a dormant portal swirls with potential energy, waiting to be activated. Ancient runes glow softly on the floor, forming a protective circle.

items.name: ancient stone altar
items.description: An altar with two perfectly shaped indentations for the sacred treasures
items.text: Inscription: 'Place the Sapphire Petal and Emerald Leaf upon this altar to awaken the portal and return to your world.'

items.name: living crystal walls
items.description: Walls that seem to breathe with magical energy, showing glimpses of other realms

items.name: sealed portal door
items.description: A shimmering portal that requires both sacred treasures to activate fully

rooms.name: The Mortal World
rooms.description: You step through the portal and find yourself back in the familiar mortal world. The sun is setting over a peaceful meadow, and the fairy realm fades like a beautiful dream. You hold the Sapphire Petal and Emerald Leaf in your hands - proof that your adventure was real.

items.name: peaceful meadow
items.description: A quiet meadow at sunset, the gateway between worlds now closed

rooms.win_message: You have successfully crossed back from the Fairy Realm! The sacred treasures in your hands shimmer one last time before transforming into ordinary flower petals that drift away on the breeze. The fairy magic fades, but the memory of your enchanted adventure will stay with you forever. You win!
